summary: Diff implements a new PS PUZZLE hub at '/' with 5 puzzle tiles and adds 5 puzzle mini-game pages with start/reset, completion states, numeric scoring, back-to-hub navigation, and signed-in gated score saving via a new hook. However, the generated static image assets themselves are not evidenced as added, and there are unrequested/constraint-violating changes to authentication/actor-related hooks and URL param utilities.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the newly generated PS PUZZLE branding and puzzle icons under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the hub UI (static files, not backend-served).
missing_requirements.reason: HubPage references the generated image paths, but the diff summary does not show any added files under frontend/public/assets/generated (only code files were added/modified). Without the actual static assets present, this requirement is not fully implemented.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin-token URL parameter parsing and session persistence utilities (including hash/query parsing) added/expanded.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request any admin-token URL parameter system; it also introduces unrelated utilities beyond the PS PUZZLE puzzle hub/mini-games/persistence scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts to initialize access control using a secret token and to invalidate/refetch queries on actor change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request changes to actor initialization; additionally, the constraints explicitly say not to edit frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts.
